source_description: Connection string to your MySql database
target_description: Connection string to your PostgreSql database
encoding_description: Encoding type of your PostgreSql database.
If not supplied, then UTF-8 will be used as a default.
schema_description: schema - a name of the schema, that will contain all migrated tables.
If not supplied, then a new schema will be created automatically.
data_chunk_size_description: During migration each table's data will be split into chunks of data_chunk_size (in MB).
If not supplied, then 10 MB will be used as a default.
